thread.title: Final Waldo County Driving and Riding Club show trots in
thread.title_full: Final Waldo County Driving and Riding Club show trots in

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Final Waldo County Driving and Riding Club show trots in
text:
Final Waldo County Driving and Riding Club show trots in By Staff | Oct 05, 2015 Courtesy of: Twyler Webster Shannon Campbell with Jokers Star Winds in Leadline during the Sept. 19 Waldo County Driving and Riding show. It was the final show of the season. Enlarge... 
Belfast — The final Waldo County Driving and Riding Club show of the season was Saturday, Sept. 19. The judge was Cohne Goodwin. After a bit of drizzle in the morning, the clouds gave way to a sunny day for the show participants. 
The show was followed by a brief club meeting to discuss banquet dates and plans. The banquet will be on Sunday, Nov. 8. The time and place of the banquet will be announced when determined. 
The Sept. 19 show classes, with first and second placings, with horse and rider, are listed as follows: 
Adult Showmanship — 1, Chelsea Lord/Amblin On Easy; and 2, Debbie Faulkner/Mocha Jo. 
Junior Showmanship — 1, Maxwell Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Youth Showmanship — 1, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise; and 2, Jasmine Willet/Chance of Smoke. 
Halter Mares — 1, Maxwell Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Chelsea Lord/Amblin On Easy. 
Halter Stallions/Geldings — 1, Jaylee Dakin/Salem; and 2, Brooklyn Boerner/Tater Tot. 
Halter Class Appaloosa — 1, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise. 
Leadline Equitation — 1, Brooklyn Boerner/Scotch Bar Scores; and 2, Logan Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody. 
Leadline Game — 1, Logan Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody; and 2, Shannon Campbell/Jokers Star Winds. 
Youth English Walk/Trot Equitation — 1, Keira Whitehouse/SS Caroline; and 2, Jaylee Dakin/Salem. 
Youth English Equitation — 1, Jasmine Willet/Chance of Smoke; and 2, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise. 
Youth English Walk/Trot Pleasure — 1, Jaylee Dakin/Salem; and 2, Keira Whitehouse/SS Caroline. 
Youth English Pleasure — 1, Jasmine Willet/Chance of Smoke; and 2, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise. 
Junior/Adult English Walk/Trot Equitation — 1, Masha Faulkner/Nellie; and 2, Debbie Faulkner/Mocha Jo. 
Adult English Equitation — 1, Chelsea Lord/Amblin On Easy. 
Jr English Equitation — 1, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Junior/Adult English Walk/Trot Pleasure — 1, Masha Faulkner/Nellie; and 2, Debbie Faulkner/Mocha Jo. 
Adult English Pleasure — 1, Chelsea Lord/Amblin On Easy. 
Junior English Pleasure — 1, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Appaloosa English Pleasure — 1, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise. 
Green English Pleasure Horse — 1, Maxwell Webster/Blazing Charsima; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Open Road Hack — 1, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Jasmine Willet/Chance Of Smoke. 
Open Command Class W/T/C — 1, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Jasmine Willet/Chance Of Smoke. 
Open Command W/T — 1, Chantel Murphy/Tara Woods Sugar Cody; and 2, Madison McKenzie/Grand Critique. 
Open Costume — 1, Brooklyn Boerner and Avis Winchester/Amblin On Easy; and 2, Logan Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody. 
Hunter Over Fences, 18” WTC — 1, Jasmine Willet/An Hour In Paradise. 
Advanced Open Trail — 1, Wade Brown/Chance Of Smoke; and 2, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma. 
Open Walk Trot Trail — 1, Chantel Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody. 
Jack Benny — 1, Melanie Langmeyer/Grand Critique. 
Green Western Pleasure Horse — 1, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Youth Western Horsemanship, W/J/L — 1, Jasmine Willet/A Chance Of Smoke; and 2, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise. 
Youth Western Pleasure W/J/L — 1, Jasmine Willet/Chance Of Smoke. 
Junior/Adult Walk/Trot Western Horsemanship — 1, Madison McKenzie/Grand Critique; and 2, Chantel Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody. 
Adult Western Horsemanship — 1, Chelsea Lord/Amblin On Easy. 
Junior Western Horsemanship — 1, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Junior/Adult W/Trot Western Pleasure — 1, Chantal Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody; and 2, Madison McKenzie/Grand Critique. 
Adult Western Pleasure — 1, Chelsea Lord/Amblin On Easy. 
Junior Western Pleasure — 1, Maxwell Webster/Blazin Charisma; and 2, Rowan Kandra/Jose Quervo. 
Appaloosa Western Pleasure — 1, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise. 
Western Pattern W/J — 1, Chantel Flewelling/Tara Woods Sugar Cody. 
Open Western Pleasure — 1, Wade Brown/An Hour In Paradise; and 2, Jasmine Willet/Chance Of Smoke. 
Open Western Pattern W/J/L — 1, Jasmine Willet/Chance Of Smoke; and 2, Max Webster/Blazin Charisma. 
Avis Winchester, club communications secretary, said vintage trophies were presented to first-place winners. Trophies were donated by members and friends from previous horse shows around the state. All season lead line entrants have enjoyed Beanie Babies and ribbons in all the equitation and game placements thanks to a sponsor of the toys. 
The season was a success with new members and show participants and, most of all, the dedication of the parents, friends, and club members who made each show run so smoothly, said Winchester. 
Avis Winchester, communications secretary, contributed information to this story. 
Courier Publications' sports staff can be reached by email at sports@villagesoup.com or by phone at 594-4401.
